summary: A villainous carnival owner traps a young werewolf to include in his growing menagerie of inhuman exhibits.
cast: Brendan Hughes|Michele Matheson|Sean Sullivan|Antonio Fargas|Carol Lynley|Jered Barclay|Bruce Payne|Gary Carlos Cervantes|Christopher Morley|Deep Roy|Randy Pelish|Ben Kronen|John A. Neris|Al White|Jeremy West|William Marquez|Gerry Black|Terri Hoyos|Elena Bertagnolli|Joe Gieb|Steven A. Lane|Elizabeth Shé|Jennifer Trinkner|Vincent Fazzari|Robert Reynolds|Shaunery Stevens|Kathleen Perryman|James E. Webb|Loarn Michels|Sandra Strong|Michelle Welch|Courtney Pakiz|Sheila Lane
title: Escalofrío: The freaks
